price: Twanamuhamagariye mu ruhande (rwe) rw’iburyo ku musozi wa Twuri (i Sinayi), turamwiyegereza kugira ngo tuvugane na we mu ibanga.
arabic: وَنَٰدَيۡنَٰهُ مِن جَانِبِ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلۡأَيۡمَنِ وَقَرَّبۡنَٰهُ نَجِيّٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wanādaynāhu min jānibi al-ṭūri al-aymani waqarrabnāhu najiyyan
